b7c48f96641f2a9002b9f2dcb6a5958dd670894ada21ae8229b3d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmUNfSBdoVtjhETaUJCYcaC7pTMgbhht926tJ2uXJbiVd3"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0xaf28a975a78550e45f65e559a3ad6a5ad43b9b8a37366999abd1b7084eb70721","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b7bd24e224f67f65bfadf85dc2929fa965456bb2415478bd0125471b5ce35245","dweb:/ipfs/QmRaydGr8BTHs1kvaZfsNU69pKzUAGFrvABn1KiRSbE51y"]},"node_modules/solmate/src/utils/FixedPointMathLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1b62af9baf5b8e991ed7531bc87f45550ba9d61e8dbff5caf237ccaf3a3fd843","license":"AGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://b7b38b977c5305b18ceefbeed4c9ceaaaefa419b520de62de6604ea661f8c0a9","dweb:/ipfs/QmecMRzgfMyDVa2pvBqMMDLYBappaj7Aa3qcMoQYEQrhWi"]}},"version":1}

calculateVestedAmountAtInterval(uint256,.details: calculates vesting with formula for sum of geometric series: Sn = a * (r^n - 1) / (r - 1)       Here, Sn is the sum of the series (total amount accrued after n intervals have elapsed), a is the first interval's accrual, r is the growth rate per interval, and n is the number of intervalshandles linear case (r=0) and exponential case (r>0)

params._elapsedIntervals: the number of intervals over which to calculate the vested amount (equivalent to "n")
params._firstIntervalAccrual: the amount of tokens to be vested after the first interval (equivalent to "a")
params._growthRateProportion: the proportion of FixedPointMathLib.WAD to increase token vesting per interval (500 = 5%, equivalent to "r-1" in the above formula, but scaled for fixed-point math where WAD is 10e18)

constructor.details: reverts if _vvvToken is the zero address

getVestedAmount(address,uint256).details: considers 4 cases for calculating withdrawable amount: 1. schedule has not started OR has not been set 2. schedule has started, but cliff has not ended 3. schedule has ended with tokens remaining to withdraw 4. schedule is in progress with tokens remaining to withdraw

params._vestedUser: the user whose withdrawable amount is being queried
params._vestingScheduleIndex: the index of the vesting schedule being queried

params._vestedUser: the address of the user whose vesting schedule is being removed
params._vestingScheduleIndex: the index of the vesting schedule being removed

setVestedToken(address).details: in-place update that carries over existing vesting schedules and user claimsreverts if _vvvtoken is the zero address

params._vvvtoken: the address of the VVV token being vested

params._tokensToVestAfterFirstInterval: the total amount of tokens to be vested after the first interval
params._tokensToVestAtStart: the total amount of tokens to be vested at schedule start
params._vestedUser: the address of the user whose vesting schedule is being set
params._vestingScheduleAmountWithdrawn: the amount of tokens that have been withdrawn
params._vestingScheduleCliffEndTime: the end time of the cliff
params._vestingScheduleGrowthRateProportion: the % increase in tokens to be vested per interval
params._vestingScheduleIndex: the index of the vesting schedule being set
params._vestingScheduleIntervalLength: the length of each interval in seconds
params._vestingScheduleStartTime: the start time of the vesting schedule

withdrawVestedTokens(uint128,address,uin.details: reverts if user withdrawable amount for that schedule is less than _tokenAmountToWithdraw

params._vestingScheduleIndex: index of vesting schedule to withdraw from

batchSetVestingSchedule((address,uint256.notice: used to batch-call _setVestingScheduleonly callable by admin

calculateVestedAmountAtInterval(uint256,.notice: handles accrual calculations for getVestedAmount using FixedPointMathLib

getVestedAmount(address,uint256).notice: returns the amount of tokens that are currently vested (exlcudes amount withdrawn)

removeVestingSchedule(address,uint256).notice: removes vesting schedule while preserving indices of other schedulesonly callable by admin

setVestedToken(address).notice: sets the address of the VVV token being vestedemits SetVestedToken event

setVestingSchedule(address,uint256,uint8.notice: sets or replaces vesting scheduleonly callable by admin

userVestingSchedules(address,uint256).notice: maps user address to array of vesting schedules

withdrawVestedTokens(uint128,address,uin.notice: allows user to withdraw any portion of their currently available tokens for a given vesting schedule
